messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] New to board
messages.msgSnippet: ... have done an electic mix of school .  But we are attempting our first year with no textbooks at all. Hope to meet and greet you all. Tina Hi Tina and
messages.messageBody:
>>hey you all! I am new! I am a hs mom of 6yrs with 2 kids. Always
have done an electic mix of "school". But we are attempting our
first year with no textbooks at all.
Hope to meet and greet you all.
Tina>>

Hi Tina and welcome to the unschooling life. It's so much more interesting
for both you and you kids outside of those boring textbooks. Read and enjoy!

Life is good.
~Mary


_________________________________________________________________
Chat with friends online, try MSN Messenger: http://messenger.msn.com

messages.subject: New to board
messages.msgSnippet: hey you all!  I am new!  I am a hs mom of 6yrs with 2 kids.  Always have done an electic mix of school .  But we are attempting our first year with no
messages.messageBody:
hey you all! I am new! I am a hs mom of 6yrs with 2 kids. Always
have done an electic mix of "school". But we are attempting our
first year with no textbooks at all.
Hope to meet and greet you all.
Tina
